attributes.action: Make “Armistice Day” a  Revered Day, our Day of Remembrance.
attributes.additional_details: It’s never too late to resolve a point of conflict.Headlines and comments on the political and social media have surpassed common sense.
attributes.background: Britain is a Multi cultural society, the majority of the Population respect notable days. Respect is Free, it costs nothing . We as Britons need our Day of Remembrance to be elevated to a place in society where it would never experience such actions by any faction at any point in the future

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prohibit all protests and political marches on Armistice Day/Remembrance Sunday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650600

Make it illegal to have public protests on days of celebration and remembrance: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651072
